ygData.subject: RE: Cleric Behavior *spoiler*
ygData.msgSnippet: ... O I have yet to go after each of these individual mobs myself so it s a bit hard to say how difficult they are, but one way to determined how hard it is,
ygData.messageBody:
>Whenever someone posts information like this, it be helpful if >you give an
>indication of difficulty.

O I have yet to go after each of these individual mobs myself so it's a bit
hard to say how difficult they are, but one way to determined how hard it
is, is by looking at what zone the item is in. You can bet that the mob
that carries these things are going to be harder then the average mob in
that zone...or on par with the hardest...although this might not hold true
in all cases.

Most of the items that have been listed by me and other posters, from what I
can see, are mobs that you can kill from 25+. The lowest difficulty one
that I've see so far are the king and warlord in RE...I can be wrong in this
though.

-Imogen
